website_summaries.verdict: A charming farmhouse style chandelier that works in an entry way or dining room.
pros: This simple chandelier has five differently shaped cages at varied heights for a unique look
Fits five 40-watt bulbs and comes in three color options
cons: Installation is challenging and time consuming

customer_reviews.title: Loved this, brings my house together
customer_reviews.text: Loved this, brings my house together. The open floor plan is in an "L" shape and I wanted something attention grabbing where it intersects to draw it all together, yet it had to be affordable. I picked the flowering parts off of mine with pliers easily and wanted to include a photo of how it looks without it. In my opinion much better.
customer_reviews.author: jesse steere

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is perfect. Each globe can be easily adjusted to the desired length. I put 40 watt chandelier bulbs in it and it is the perfect brightness to eat by. I liked this so well I bought 2 of the single pendant lights that matched it for the other side of the room. I would buy this again in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Sew Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this fixture. Have it hanging over the informal dining room table. Gets a ton of compliments. I use the clear round LED bulbs in it, not the Edison bulbs. Looks stunning. Would buy again a million times..
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to install
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are worthless and the hardware is inadequate. The screws are too short to attach to the plate and even if you splice the cords as we did, it is tricky (insert hours, curse words, and sweat) to fix to the top bracket. There are better designs where fixture plates can twist onto brackets after installation... I love the look, and after much hard work, it's up, so that's where it'll stay.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki T

customer_reviews.title: Great Chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: This fixture was relatively easy to put together and it looks amazing! I get compliments from everybody who walks through my front door! I look forward to this being over my dining room table for a long time. It's the perfect size (I have a 6.5 foot long by 3 foot wide rectangular table) and gives off so much light since the cages are just wire and not a type of shade.
customer_reviews.author: avalone

customer_reviews.title: Industrial Look suits my space
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on these often. They replaced an ugly ceiling fan. I'm so happy for the change. Who wants a fan blowing on your dinner? My son installed these lights. It took a little patience because you can decide the length of each cord. But they do all connect behind one nice black matching ceiling cover. We also modified them by easily snipping off the bottom loops on one. You can buy replacement Edison type lights everywhere now. Nice soft light, but enough light.
customer_reviews.author: mary class

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice now, but will look a bit better with ...
customer_reviews.text: Just had it installed by my contractor, but haven't had the lengths adjusted yet. It looks nice now, but will look a bit better with different heights of the bulbs. They look nice because they aren't a big presence. I can look from my kitchen straight down through the dining room, living room to my big front window with a view.
customer_reviews.author: Julia B.

customer_reviews.title: Vaulted mount
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments on this fixture. Love it!! Wanted to post pic showing that I mounted on vaulted ceiling. It is Christmas so I wrapped cords.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: we love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had difficulty as others did with installation. He has had over 40 years of home improvement and light installing. We found the 5 lights to be to much for our slanted ceiling in our foyer. We ended up only using 3. Also the black base proved to be over powering in the space so painted the color of ceiling. In the end, with all that being said, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light and Fantastic Installation
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I looks fantastic in my bar and very impressed with Amazon's service option. The gentleman showed up on time as scheduled and did a great job putting in the chandelier. Very happy with the overall purchase and would definitely use the service option again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: rhickmo

customer_reviews.title: We wanted to put it up in our stairwell on ...
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to put it up in our stairwell on a vaulted ceiling but just couldn't make it happen. Way too difficult to install without a third arm, ended up returning it. The screws were way too small to screw the fixture into the ceiling. You'll probably want a professional to install for you or have an extra set of hands available.
customer_reviews.author: nicole888

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them! They arrived in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my kitchen & one for my dining room. I absolutely love them! They arrived in a timely manner, were packaged very well, went up adequately and look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kate St Germaine

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Looks gorgeous over my breakfast table. A little heavy so it was a bit of a struggle to hang but totally worth it! I recommend this to be a two person hanging job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for big open spaces
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but bigger then I expected. Did not use in dining room. Decided on ceiling fan. Love the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love this fixture. I lost a screw cover and the company sent me a replacement plus 1 extra.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: I like how the light fixture looks but I would not ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this unless you want to spend hours installing it. My husband and son-in-law, who are very handy, took over 2 hours to put it together. I like how the light fixture looks but I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks cool, just like how it looks in the product ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks cool, just like how it looks in the product photo. However it's light weight and feel cheap. It's a pain to install in, after a long fight, I managed to install it somehow. Love the look, just don't feel it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Headache to install, but SO worth it
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a nightmare like the other reviews mentioned, but the finished product is worth it. gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: mcaraway

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!! It looks just so awesome!! It looks perfect in our entryway.bwe get so many comments on it!! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: A great fixture. Gives off a very warm light and is very attractive
customer_reviews.author: Jarro

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the light...HATE the instructions. Seriously happy with my purchase, though.
customer_reviews.author: rachel rose

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good!! Good price!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! We had a wagon wheel that sat waiting to be used for lighting for my dining room! I ordered this and this is what my husband did with it. I love it so much. Impressed with quality and the price. Would recommend and would purchase again. Love it (pictured below)
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and adjust the length
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and adjust the length. They are a focal point to be sure. They are perfect to blend older and modern elements in a room.
customer_reviews.author: mary blue- nightengale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, super fast shipping. I love it!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great once able to be creative to get it up ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great once able to be creative to get it up properly. There are too many thick wires to place inside plate against ceiling. Had to cut wires and buy longer screws to get up properly
customer_reviews.author: E.Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Great Look/ Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Really great look- we had a little trouble installing though. The wires didn't want to fit flush under the plate.
customer_reviews.author: kj.

customer_reviews.title: We love it. It was not as difficult to install ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It was not as difficult to install as some people said, BUT it did require more than just hanging--including cutting wires and drilling some extra holes. But LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandilier. Assembly directions are horrible and we had ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chandilier. Assembly directions are horrible and we had to cut cords to make it fit. In the end, it looks great and I'm very happy so far, but it was a royal pain to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Unique
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying our new entry way light. This is different than any I've seen...unique look, nice quality! The antique LED bulbs were on the pricey side, but really compliment the look!
customer_reviews.author: Barb, RN

customer_reviews.title: It is really a good looking fixture but is unable to be installed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Thus light fixture is a work in progress. It is really a good looking fixture but is unable to be installed the way it is sent. The pendants have to be shorten for the vase to be installed and set flush upon the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking light
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking light. A pain in the arse to install. Got r done though. Lots of compliments on the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Drenther

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality. I am an engineer and this was ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. No instructions, Poor Quality. I am an engineer and this was not easy to assemble. I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Micallef

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Easy to install. I had to change the screws from one inch to 1 1/4. Easy fix. I too removed the flowery parts to look a little more sophisticated. They snapped right off. No wire cutter needed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite light in our new house
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite light in our new house, I have it on a dimmer. My only complaint is it takes awhile to wire.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I love these and get compliments on them all the time
customer_reviews.text: I love these and get compliments on them all the time. I put Edison bulbs in them and people love it!
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pretty!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty... And easy to put up. Looked up installing light fixtures on youtube and my son and I did a great job getting it up and working. Love the unique look.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: but looks great once it's up
customer_reviews.text: Hard to install, but looks great once it's up. I have gotten lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing but pay attention to the measurements. The wire cages are large.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: these lights are great love the way they hand & illuminate. very easy to change bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look...quality was great. Kind of a pain to install bit worth the aggravation
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth kelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quick update for any room.
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous and exceeded my expectations. I based my decision to purchase these lights solely on the picture provided by Amazon-only glancing at the dimensions. To my surprise they were a good bit larger than I thought and a good heavy feel to them. Not a light, 'cheap' feeling metal at all. The brushed nickel looks exactly as it does in the photo. I bought one for my breakfast nook and the other for my dining room. I love these fixtures and recommend highly for a quick update to any room.
customer_reviews.author: Revillusion

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Quite a statement piece and it finished ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Quite a statement piece and it finished off my kitchen remodel. Funky and rustic and fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture
customer_reviews.text: I love this light fixture so glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but be aware, it did not come with light bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Sanja Ljubicic

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: item was returned due to wires not marked for installation
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing light fixture! We got it for our entry way and get tons of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fixture looks great when installed but it is not an easy fixture to install
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best out of all people just stop and look,how beautiful
customer_reviews.author: ROY BANTA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks, Installation was almost impossible and my husband is VERY handy.
customer_reviews.author: jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, beautifully designed, good instructions, fast shipment. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Fuller

customer_reviews.title: But they were very easy to remove with wire snips
customer_reviews.text: The petals design on two of the five enclosures was a bit too much for me. But they were very easy to remove with wire snips, and did not leave any traces. Now it looks much more elegant, just fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri Zorine

customer_reviews.title: Pros - looks great cons - pain in the a** to install
customer_reviews.text: Pros - looks great cons - pain in the a** to install
customer_reviews.author: Richard Haymond

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the WOW factor I was looking for. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: End result good
customer_reviews.text: Packing horrible, directions terrible. Product is fine, although expect bulbs to arrive broken. Seller was fine to work with, issued partial refund for bulbs. Looks great now that it is hanging over the table.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Wooton

customer_reviews.title: More than better!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased quite a lot lights from this seller. Each light has the own style and character with it. I did love this kind of vintage style, particularly the black finish. The item is exactly what the picture show me. The length of cord could be adjusted if you want. The cage of light could be relocated. Because the Edison light was not bright enough, I changed the five bulbs. However, it was indicated by the seller. I would be showing it to my friends when they come visit me :)
customer_reviews.author: weiyang

customer_reviews.title: Good products and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought two light fixtures as gift for my friend’s house that just beingrenovated. He was very happy, and Installed one in his dining room and the other one in living room. It is very stylish, nice black painted. It comes with Edison bulbs that are beautiful but a little dim, just for good look. My friend changed them to CFLs, still very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: yuanyuan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: we love this light fixture. Have received a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: They look great in the box but have not hung yet as ...
customer_reviews.text: They look great in the box but have not hung yet as getaway house under renovation. These are going over the dining room table; the table is grey wicker so will look perfect. Unless there is some type of mechanical problem I don't know about, I would highly recommend these - they look exactly as pictured and delivery/packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: Christiinfl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light. Something really different for over our kitchen table. Perfect for a small table.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. but it was difficult t put up.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Horsager

customer_reviews.title: One fixture does not work! 😬
customer_reviews.text: I love this pendant light fixture. However, I had to wait for my handyman to install it and once he did we found that one of the lights doesn't work. I just need the broken one replaced, but because I had to wait for installation the return policy expired. Therefore, although the I love the look of the fixture in my home, I cannot recommend it. If you purchase something that needs installation, make sure you don't get the product too far in advance of the installation!
customer_reviews.author: michelle garry

product_meta.title: Unitary Brand Rustic Barn Metal Chandelier Max 200w with 5 Lights Black Finish
feature_bullets: Product Dimensions:39.4x15.75x15.75inch,height adjustable.Suggested Space Size:20-30Sq.m.It's the perfect light fixture to install in bedroom,living room,foyers,dining room.
Voltage:120V for North America.Power: Max 40W X 5(Bulbs not included)
